Sentencas: In electrochemical devices such as fuel cells or batteries the microstructure is a determining factor for the performance of the device.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: To be able to optimize the microstructure it is important to be able to quantitatively measure key structural parameters, such that systematic studies can be made.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: We present several general methods for quantitative characterization of network structures without prior assumptions of shape or application.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: The characterization is performed by extracting distributions of values rather than single value descriptions, thus allowing more detailed comparisons between samples to be made.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: The methods characterize tortuosity, path diameters, the novel dead ends property and a particle shape independent alternative to a particle size distribution.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: The parameters are calculated by the computation of arrival time maps by the fast marching method.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions

Sentencas: The methods are applied to the analysis of each of the three phases in a solid oxide fuel cell sample.
Titulo: Geometrical characterization of interconnected phase networks in three dimensions
